yogaWithRetreat.name: Hathayoga med meditation
yogaWithRetreat.description: Ett lugnt yogapass som kombinerar Hatha-positioner, andningstekniker och guidad meditation. Stärk din kropp, lugna ditt sinne och lämna passet känslomässigt avslappnad, balanserad och energifylld. Passar alla nivåer.

yogaWithRetreat.name: Yinyoga med meditation
yogaWithRetreat.description: Ett lugnande och återställande pass som kombinerar mjuka yinyoga-positioner med guidad meditation. De långa, djupa sträckningarna i yinyoga släpper spänningar, förbättrar flexibilitet och stimulerar energiflödet, medan meditationen hjälper till att stilla sinnet, minska stress och skapa inre balans. Denna övning passar alla nivåer och erbjuder djup avslappning för både kropp och sinne.

massageAndOsteopathy.name: Osteopati med massage
massageAndOsteopathy.description: Osteopati i kombination med massagebehandling erbjuder ett holistiskt förhållningssätt till smärtlindring, förbättrad rörlighet och långsiktig återhämtning. Genom att kombinera osteopatiska tekniker såsom ledmobilisering, mjukdelsbehandling och stretching med massagens muskelavslappnande effekter bidrar behandlingen till att lösa upp spänningar, förbättra cirkulationen och återställa balansen i kroppen. Den är särskilt effektiv vid rygg- och nackbesvär, idrottsskador, huvudvärk, stressrelaterade spänningar och hållningsproblem. Obs! Bekväma träningskläder rekommenderas för bästa upplevelse.

massageAndOsteopathy.name: Klassisk massage
massageAndOsteopathy.description: Klassisk massage är en lugnande och återställande behandling som kombinerar mjuka strykningar, knådning och lätt tryck för att lösa upp spänningar och stödja kroppens naturliga läkningsprocess. Massagen kan utföras över hela kroppen eller fokuseras på problemområden som rygg, axlar och nacke. Den hjälper till att förbättra blodcirkulationen, minska stelhet och främja djup avslappning, vilket gör den till ett utmärkt val för stresslindring och allmänt välbefinnande. Trycket kan anpassas efter dina önskemål, från mjukt och avslappnande till mer fokuserat och djupgående, för att säkerställa en personlig upplevelse som passar dig.

massageAndOsteopathy.name: Djupvävnadsmassage
massageAndOsteopathy.description: En kraftfull massage som arbetar på djupet i muskler och bindväv. Behandlingen använder långsamma och djupa tryck för att lösa upp muskelspänningar och ärrvävnad, lindra kronisk smärta, förbättra rörlighet och släppa på spänningar. Passar för personer med långvariga muskelproblem, stelhet eller skador.

massageAndOsteopathy.name: Idrottsmassage
massageAndOsteopathy.description: Idrottsmassage är en målinriktad behandling som fokuserar på specifika muskelgrupper och problemområden, vilket gör den mycket effektiv både för förebyggande arbete och rehabilitering av skador eller överbelastning. Genom att kombinera tekniker som djupgående massage, triggerpunktsbehandling, stretching, myofasciell behandling och ledmobilisering arbetar behandlingen med att lösa upp spänningar, förbättra cirkulationen och återställa balansen i kroppen. Idrottsmassage minskar inte bara stelhet och obehag utan påskyndar även återhämtningen, ökar rörligheten och hjälper till att förebygga framtida skador. Oavsett om du är idrottare, har ett stillasittande arbete och upplever muskelspänningar, eller helt enkelt vill förbättra din prestationsförmåga och rörlighet, anpassas denna massage efter dina behov. Obs! För bästa upplevelse rekommenderar vi att du bär bekväma kläder eller träningskläder som ger god rörelsefrihet under behandlingen.

cupping.name: Cupping therapy with massage
cupping.description: This technique can be beneficial for pain such as sore backs and shoulders or simply for relaxation. Glass cups are placed on the body through a vacuum created with fire and are either left on fixed points or gently moved over the skin. Cupping increases circulation and can therefore help relieve pain. The treatment works by relieving muscle tension and stiffness, improving blood circulation, supporting the body’s natural detox process through stimulation of the lymphatic system, strengthening the immune system, and reducing inflammation. It also promotes relaxation and helps reduce stress by positively affecting the nervous system. Suitable for: People with chronic pain, circulation problems, or those who want to improve their recovery and relaxation.

cupping.name: Cupping with massage of back and shoulder
cupping.description: This technique can be beneficial for pain such as sore backs and shoulders or just relaxation. The glass cups are placed on the body through a vacuum created with fire. These rest on fixed points on the body or are moved over the skin. Cupping increases circulation, among other things, and can thus relieve pain. Technique: The cups are placed on the skin and either left in place or moved gently over the body. Effects: Relieves muscle tension and stiffness. Increases blood circulation and helps with recovery. Supports the body's natural detox process by stimulating the lymphatic system. Can strengthen the immune system and reduce inflammation. Promotes relaxation and reduces stress by affecting the nervous system. Suitable for: People with chronic pain, circulation problems or those who want to improve their recovery and relaxation. NOTE! This treatment is not suitable for those who are pregnant or have a fever.

facialAndSkincare.name: Active acne treatment
facialAndSkincare.description: A specialized treatment designed for skin with active acne. The focus is on deep cleansing, exfoliation, and reducing inflammation while being gentle on sensitive skin. The treatment helps to clear clogged pores, calm redness, and prevent future breakouts. Tailored products are used to balance the skin and support healing, leaving it refreshed and healthier looking.

facialAndSkincare.name: Hydra facial (Face)
facialAndSkincare.description: Experience a deep-cleansing, exfoliating, and hydrating facial with our hydro dermabrasion tool. This treatment removes impurities, revitalizes the skin, and provides an instant radiant glow. Suitable for all skin types, it leaves your complexion refreshed, smooth, and luminous.

facialAndSkincare.name: Hydra facial (Face & Neck)
facialAndSkincare.description: Experience a deep-cleansing, exfoliating, and hydrating facial with our hydro dermabrasion tool. This treatment removes impurities, revitalizes the skin, and provides an instant radiant glow. Suitable for all skin types, it leaves your complexion refreshed, smooth, and luminous.

facialAndSkincare.name: Hydra facial (Anti-aging)
facialAndSkincare.description: A revitalizing treatment designed to target fine lines, wrinkles, and loss of firmness. This HydraFacial combines deep cleansing and exfoliation with hydrating serums rich in antioxidants, peptides, and hyaluronic acid. It stimulates cell renewal, boosts collagen production, and restores elasticity, leaving the skin smoother, plumper, and radiant. Perfect for anyone who wants a youthful, refreshed glow without invasive procedures.

facialAndSkincare.name: Deep cleaning
facialAndSkincare.description: A classic treatment designed to deeply cleanse and refresh the skin. The treatment includes cleansing, exfoliation, steaming, pore extraction, a soothing mask, and nourishing products tailored to your skin type. It helps remove impurities, balance the skin, and leave it feeling clean, fresh, and revitalized. Ideal for those struggling with clogged pores, uneven texture, or dull skin.

facialAndSkincare.name: Diamond dermabrasion
facialAndSkincare.description: Diamond dermabrasion is a non-invasive exfoliation treatment that uses a diamond-tipped tool to gently remove dead skin cells, dirt, and impurities from the surface. This stimulates blood circulation, encourages collagen production, and improves skin texture. The result is smoother, brighter, and more radiant skin. It’s ideal for reducing fine lines, uneven texture, acne scars, and dullness.

facialAndSkincare.name: Korean facial
facialAndSkincare.description: The Korean facial is a multi-step skincare treatment inspired by traditional Korean beauty routines. It includes deep cleansing, exfoliation, hydration, and targeted nourishment to revitalize the skin. This treatment enhances skin elasticity, improves tone, reduces dryness and dullness, and promotes a natural, radiant glow. It’s perfect for maintaining youthful, healthy-looking skin.

facialAndSkincare.name: Skin tightening with RF
facialAndSkincare.description: Skin tightening with RF uses radiofrequency energy to gently heat the deeper layers of the skin, stimulating collagen and elastin production. This non-surgical treatment firms and lifts sagging skin, smooths fine lines, and restores elasticity. It’s a safe and effective way to achieve a more youthful and rejuvenated appearance without downtime.

facialAndSkincare.name: Pigment treatment
facialAndSkincare.description: A targeted treatment designed to reduce dark spots, sun damage, and uneven skin tone. The procedure combines deep cleansing, exfoliation, and active serums to lighten pigmentation and restore skin balance. By stimulating cell renewal and boosting radiance, this treatment helps the skin appear clearer, brighter, and more even. Suitable for all skin types concerned with hyperpigmentation.

corporateWellnessPackage.name: Corporate Wellness Package
corporateWellnessPackage.description: Invest in your team’s health, productivity, and well-being with our customized corporate wellness solutions. We offer a variety of services including yoga, meditation, massage, posture correction, and holistic treatments — all tailored to your company’s needs. For the best deals and fully personalized packages, please contact us directly: Email: sywellnessab@gmail.com Phone: 0739718753, 0739718741 Our team will work with you to design a wellness program that fits your employees, schedule, and goals.

healing.name: Reiki Healing
healing.description: A gentle and powerful energy treatment that promotes relaxation, balance, and natural healing. Reiki works by channeling universal life energy through the therapist’s hands to release blockages, reduce stress, and restore harmony in body and mind. The treatment is deeply calming and suitable for anyone seeking more energy, inner peace, and overall well-being.

healing.name: Aura Energy scanner with 7 chakras balance
healing.description: This unique session begins with an aura scan that provides insight into your energy field and the state of your seven chakras. Based on the scan, balancing techniques are applied to harmonize your chakras, release blockages, and restore energy flow. The treatment promotes emotional clarity, inner peace, and a deeper connection to yourself. Perfect for anyone seeking greater balance and holistic well-being.

healing.name: Sound healing
healing.description: A deeply relaxing treatment that uses the vibrations of sound from instruments such as singing bowls, gongs, or chimes to restore harmony in body and mind. The sound frequencies help reduce stress, release tension, and support natural healing processes. Perfect for anyone seeking inner calm, improved energy flow, and a meditative experience.

healing.name: Access bars healing
healing.description: A gentle and transformative energy treatment that works by lightly touching 32 energy points on the head. These points store thoughts, beliefs, and emotions that may limit you. By activating them, Access Bars helps release blockages, reduce stress, and open up for more clarity, ease, and positive energy in life. The session creates deep relaxation and supports both mental and emotional balance.
